description: Try our easy to follow White Chocolate Oreo Truffles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: White Chocolate Oreo Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate Melts and cream in a microwave safe bowl on medium heat for 2 minutes, or until melted.
Stir well to combine. Leave it to cool.
When cool, mix through three quarters of the Oreos, reserving some for decorating.
Pour into a flat container (a plastic takeaway container is ideal) and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Scoop into small balls and place onto a lined tray. Return to refrigerator to firm.
Melt white baking chocolate in a microwave safe bowl on medium heat for 2 minutes.
Stir in oil and mix well.
Coat each ball in melted chocolate, using 2 forks for lifting.
Place balls on lined baking tray, scatter over the remaining crushed Oreos and leave to set.
